tag_list: lean-startup, boomstartup, startup, entrepreneur, angel, vegas-tech, downtown-las-vegas
overview:
Empowering amazing founders and startups passionate about building community in downtown Las Vegas. He’s active in the #VegasTech ecosystem, working with @vegastechfund, and part of @downtownprojlv. www.downtownproject.com

With proven experience as founder of SchoolCenter he knows what it takes to build a technology company from the ground up. SchoolCenter is the leading strategic online solutions company that provides school districts with a proven approach to developing and implementing best-in-class online environments.

In his roll as Executive Director for BoomStartup he used lean startup principles to guide the development of startup teams.

He has also contributed to many nonprofit organizations. His three terms as an executive board member for the SIF Association proves his dedication to building a stronger technology foundation. The SIF specification ensures that educational data systems work together and free up educators to do what they do best: teach.
